title: Yaaaaaaaayyy Zoe's out!! :D
body:
I can finally play the new mid laner ^^
it only took a whole week of waiting, but it saved me a month of blue essence gathering :D

replies.body:
Are you trying to have a go at Riot, by saying how it took you a month just to afford this new champ?

Im pretty sure there was a post saying you earn more BE in the new system vs the old IP system.

Only thing Riot hasn't done since last patch, is add the 50BE and 475xp daily mission which was promised.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/X4aKvINq-luck-manipulation-and-the-reason-riots-averages-are-useless

Riot is just making up shit, and not just from what Jason has said but from my own experience the amount of BE you earn compared to the amount of time spent playing is ridiculous. Riot have just added another "Random Dice Roll" to their game. Through leveling up all I've earned so far is a bunch of champion shards for champions I already own and other random champions that I don't want or are too expensive to turn into permanent shards. The amount you get from disenchanting is bullshit, a 3150 BE champion can be disenchanted for 1350 BE, and a 6300 BE can be disenchanted for 3150 BE. I've gotten 1 6300 BE champion so far, that was the ONLY time I earned a decent amount of BE from a level up. Luck manipulation in games is stupid and shouldn't be a thing.
